sentences.en: He desired me to inform her that he had made his peace with God.
sentences.cn: 他想让我告诉她他已接受了上天的安排，获得了心灵的安宁。

sentences.en: Her experience as a refugee informs the content of her latest novel.
sentences.cn: 她的难民经历影响了她最新小说的内容。

sentences.en: I am not going to inform of anyone.
I regret to inform you he died as a consequence of his injuries.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾地通知你，他因伤势太重不治身亡。

sentences.en: I'm happy to inform you that you have been promoted to captain.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴地告诉你,你已被提升为上尉了.

sentences.en: It would be better to inform his parents.
My daughter informed me that she was pregnant.
sentences.cn: 我女儿告诉我她怀孕了。

sentences.en: Now I'll inform you about it.
Please inform me of your date of departure.
Please inform us of any changes of address.
sentences.cn: 地址若有变动请随时通知我们。

sentences.en: Please inform us of your decision and we will act accordingly.
sentences.cn: 请把你们的决定通知我们,我们会照着去办的.

sentences.en: Teachers inform me that Tracey's behaviour has improved no end.
sentences.cn: 老师们告诉我特雷西的行为大有改善。

sentences.en: The concept of the Rose continued to inform the poet's work.
sentences.cn: 玫瑰的概念持续贯穿于诗人的作品中。

sentences.en: The smuggler was finally obliged to inform against his boss.
sentences.cn: 那个走私犯最后不得不告发他的首领.

sentences.en: They decided to inform the police.
They would inform him of any progress they had made.
sentences.cn: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

sentences.en: to inform the embassy of the situation
We regret to inform you that you are being furloughed indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 我们遗憾地通知您，您将要无限期地在家待岗。

sentences.en: We simply want to inform people objectively about events.
sentences.cn: 我们只是想如实地向人们通报事件情况。
